IP_SYN_2_style_1:
Indication: PAP, hypoxia.
Anesthesia: GA, Left DLT.
Procedure:
- DLT placed, isolation confirmed.
- Left Whole Lung Lavage initiated.
- 1L aliquots warm saline instilled/drained.
- Total 8L instilled. Effluent cleared.
- Extubated to NiPPV.
Complications: Transient hypoxia/agitation.
